EXISTENCE_OTHER_PARTICULAR_CONDITIONS.P: Guarantee for quality performance of the contract: yes (5 %)

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: In order to prove its personal condition the economic operator is obliged to submit the following documents:
— Statement of the economic operator that in the past 5 years it was not rendered a final judgment for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— Confirmation by a competent organ that a bankruptcy procedure was not opened,
— Confirmation by a competent organ that a liquidation procedure was not opened,
— Confirmation for paid taxes, contributions and other public duties by a competent organ in the country where the economic operator was registered,

— Certificate from the Registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that minor penalty ban on participation in public tender procedures, awarding contracts and agreements for public-private partnership has not been imposed on him,
— certificate from the Registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal persons that a minor penalty for temporary or permanent prohibition of a specific activity has not been imposed over him,
— confirmation that a final judgment — prohibition of professional activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing professional activity has not been imposed over him.
Capacity for performing professional activity of economic operator:

In order to prove its capacity for performing professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity as an evidence that it has been registered as natural or legal entity for performing the activity related to the public procurement subject or an evidence that it is a member of a relevant professional association in accordance to the regulations of the country where it is registered.

When determining the capacity for performing professional activity of economic operators, the Contracting organ shall also request an evidence issued by a competent organ for meeting the special conditions for performing the activity prescribed in accordance to the law, which are related to the subject of the contract. In order to prove its capacity for performing professional activity, the economic operator should submit — Document for registered activity — DRD Form or confirmation for registered activity.
— Decision for wholesale of medical devices pursuant to the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: For registered medical devices — decision for putting into market circulation of finished drugs or temporary or permanent approval for parallel import, pursuant to the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices. For unregistered medical devices — Import license (approval for intervention import) pursuant to the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: For registered medical devices — the economic operator, for the offered goods, should have provided approval for putting into circulation on the market of finished drugs or temporary or permanent approval for parallel import, pursuant to Law on medicines and medical devices. For unregistered medical devices — the economic operator, for the offered goods, should have provided a document allowing import (approval for intervention import) pursuant to Law on medicines and medical devices.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The Contracting organ shall use electronic auction as a last phase in the subject procedure. Subject of the auction is the lowest offered total price for each part of the public procurement subject, i.e. the lowest price of the acceptable bids submitted in the initial phase of the procedure. The invitations for participation at the auction shall be submitted in electronic form through ESJN, after full evaluation of the initial bids, to all economic operators that submitted acceptable bids in the first phase of the procedure.

The invitation for participation in the auction shall contain the following data: starting price of the auction, i.e. the lowest price of the initially submitted bids; date and hour of beginning and the ending of auction; the interval in which the negative bidding shall take place (minimum and maximum difference in the offered prices); as well as the current ranking of the bidder made on the basis of the initially submitted price.
More information regarding the electronic auction is contained in the tender documentation.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: PHI Healthcare Center of Skopje — Polyclinic Bit Pazar — second floor, Meeting Hall, address Krste Misirkov Bld No. 28, 1000 Skopje-R.Macedonia

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: The authorized persons of the economic operators should submit a Power of Attorney in order to attend and take active participation in the public opening of bids.
